definition: Ganzhou district of Zhangye city 張掖市|张掖市[Zhang1 ye4 shi4], Gansu
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: The exploitation potential of Ganzhou region is the most in the middle reaches of the Heihe River, and Shandan County is the least.
sentences.chinese: 其中以甘州區水資源開發利用潛力最大，山丹縣最小。
